name: Broken Glass Kids: World at War
name_original: Broken Glass Kids: World at War
description:
In Early 2020 when I moved schools my new elective class was Web Game Development and after a while of being in that class I decided I wanted to make a real game a free game for Mobile and PC for people to enjoy my first official game was published September 1, 2021 on Newgrounds called Chase The Dragon Fly it was a basic game you just moved your character to the Dragon Fly but then I found RPG Maker a engine where I could create this RPG I bought it on Steam for 15 dollars and got to work I finished the game 15 days later and wanted to wait on publishing I decided to publish this game on January 1, 2022 to not only bring in a New Year but a new era of my way of developing games.

Controls:

PC:

Movement: Arrow keys, Num pad

Action: Z, Enter, Space or walk up to it

Cancel: X, Esc, Num pad 0

Menu: X, Esc, Num pad 0

Dash: Shift

Previous Page: Q, Page Up

Next Page: W, Page Down

Scroll Pages: Arrow Keys, Num pad

Xbox Controller:

Movement: D-Pad

Action: A

Cancel: B

Menu: Y

Dash: X

Previous Page: LB

Next Page: RB

Scroll Pages: D-Pad

Playstation Controller:

Movement: D-Pad

Action: X button

Cancel: Circle

Menu: Triangle

Dash: Square

Previous Page: L1

Next Page: R1

Scroll Pages: D-Pad

Mobile Controls:

Movement: Tap destination *2

Action: Tap target

Cancel: Tap with two fingers

Menu: Tap with two fingers

Dash: None

Previous Page: None

Next Page: None

Scroll Pages: Tap and hold as you swipe from inside of page to outside of page.

Mouse:

Movement: Click destination *2

Action: Click Target

Cancel: Right Click

Menu: Right Click

Dash: None

Previous Page: None

Next Page: None

Scroll Pages: Drag from inside of page to outside of page/mouse scroll wheel
